casebody.data:
No. 1264,

Misc.

Purvis v. Superior Court of Alameda County. Herman W. Mintz, for petitioner. Stanley Mosk, Attorney General of California, Arlo Smith, Chief Assistant Attorney General, and Albert W. Harris, Jr. and John F. Kraetzer, Deputy Attorneys General, for respondent.

Supreme Court of California. Certiorari denied.
